system.sustained:
Whilst power is sustained, Psyker can gain one of: Amphibious, Amorphous, Burrower(3), Cralwer, Flyer(4), Multiple Arms(3), Natural Armour(2), Natural Weapons, Quadruped, a +10 x Degrees of Success Bonus to disguise tests to appear as another person (appearance, vocal cords, and genetic structure). 
This power can be activated multiple times simultaneously, choosing a different option with each activation.
